definitions.text: change or alter in form, appearance, or nature
examples: She transformed the clay into a beautiful sculpture

definitions.text: change in outward structure or looks
examples: The salesman metamorphosed into an ugly beetle

definitions.text: change from one form or medium into another
convert (one form of energy) to another
change (a bacterial cell) into a genetically distinct cell by the introduction of DNA from another cell of the same or closely related species
increase or decrease (an alternating current or voltage)
